rules.ruleString: Any co-req (I/W) unit in {ADA4500, MDC4550, OHS1000}
Must be enrolled in course version {F6002}

description: The Design Fundamentals Studio is specifically created to enable non-cognate students within the Master of Design to understand and practice the concepts, theories and skills expected of design enquiry and intervention to solve problems. Students undertake a series of exercises concerned with the processes that underpin the composition and assembling of the elements of form, shape and narrative in response to visual, object, spatial and temporal investigation and problem solving. The acquired skills and knowledge will enable the student to approach advanced design challenges with confidence.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
